ing: 1 (8 ounce) container fat free frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (9 inch) low fat graham cracker pie crust
des: "If you're watching your weight but have a huge sweet tooth, then this is the recipe for you! The only fat in this no-bake recipe is in the crust."
ins: In a large bowl, beat cream cheese and confectioners' sugar until smooth. Gently fold in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Refrigerate for 2 hours or until set.
